# List projects and contexts
exec ugh --db $WORK/db.sqlite add Buy milk +groceries @home
exec ugh --db $WORK/db.sqlite add (A) Call mom +family @phone due:2026-01-02
exec ugh --db $WORK/db.sqlite add Plan trip +travel
exec ugh --db $WORK/db.sqlite add Review docs +work @office
exec ugh --db $WORK/db.sqlite add Meeting +work @office
exec ugh --db $WORK/db.sqlite done 5

# Projects default (todo only)
exec ugh --db $WORK/db.sqlite projects
stdout 'family'
stdout 'groceries'
stdout 'travel'
stdout 'work'
! stdout 'misc'

# Projects JSON
exec ugh --db $WORK/db.sqlite projects --json
stdout '\[.*\]'

# Contexts default (todo only)
exec ugh --db $WORK/db.sqlite contexts
stdout 'home'
stdout 'office'
stdout 'phone'
! stdout 'misc'

# Projects with done task
exec ugh --db $WORK/db.sqlite add Review logs +misc
exec ugh --db $WORK/db.sqlite done 6
exec ugh --db $WORK/db.sqlite projects
! stdout 'misc'

# Projects all
exec ugh --db $WORK/db.sqlite projects --all
stdout 'misc'

# Contexts all
exec ugh --db $WORK/db.sqlite contexts --all
! stdout 'misc'

# Projects done only
exec ugh --db $WORK/db.sqlite projects --done
stdout 'misc'
